resources.string: Turn your RedMagic 5S\'s symbol lamp into a notification LED.

This is an app which lets you use your RedMagic 5S\'s symbol lamp as a notification LED. Please grant the app permission to write secure settings using ADB. Click on the settings button to switch LED effect and suspend the app.
For the app to work, you need to enable the Notification Listener Service. Enable it now?
New notifications will not cause the LED to turn on
New notifications will cause the LED to turn on
